description: Lets a user select a time.

max.description: Maximum value expressed in HH:MM (may be ignored by some clients prior to version 1.3).

min.description: Minimum value expressed in HH:MM (may be ignored by some clients prior to version 1.3).

placeholder.description: Description of the input desired. Displayed when no time has been selected.

value.description: The initial value for this field expressed in HH:MM.
